positions.subtitle: Technology Transfer Group, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Technology Transfer Group (TTG) is a students' initiative under the aegis of Sponsored Research & Industrial Consultancy, IIT Kharagpur, which believes in the potential of the Institute as a premier Research & Development centre. We act as a link between the industry and the academia to facilitate the transfer of industry-ready technologies and presenting IIT Kharagpur as a research consultant.

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: • Mentored by Prof. Goutam Sen at IIT Kharagpur related to Development of a DSS tool for addressing emergency/disaster management which is under ISRO• Successfully learned how to use QGIS software and apply it on maps to help optimize route-mapping.• Organized important paperwork in the form of presentation which includes research scope documentation.• Performed a case study on Uttarakhand and Chennai floods to study how GIS helped in flood response and disaster management
